topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5541abdb6368722b899f1600#post_5541abdb6368722b899f1600
Even besides the problem that is Alice, the movies have so many other problems
Obviously discontinuity between movies and games, but even massive discontinuity between movies
To a point where you are seemingly supposed to remember certain parts of previous movies, and forget specific parts of those same movies, for the film to make sense

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5541ac596368724f1c5f0b00#post_5541ac596368724f1c5f0b00
And randomly taking things from the game and putting them in nonsensical places. Like I'm pretty sure there have been at virus zombies in the movies that had Los plagas head pops

I just see them as dumb over the top movies that just so happen to be named resident evil. They're more fun that way
